title: Definitions
context: PART I. FRUITS, VEGETABLES, AND COFFEE §148-1 Definitions. As used in this part: &ldquo;Chairperson&rdquo; means chairperson of the board of agriculture or the chairperson&rsquo;s authorized agents. &ldquo;Department&rdquo; means the department of agriculture. &ldquo;Fresh fruits, fresh vegetables, and coffee&rdquo; means any fresh fruit, fresh vegetable and coffee whether imported or produced in the State. [L 1961, c 73, §1 and c 132, §2; am L 1963, c 206, §2; Supp, §22C-1; HRS §148-1; am L 1969, c 72, §1; gen ch 1985, 1993] Revision Note Numeric designations deleted and definitions rearranged. Cross References Grades and standards, see chapter 147.
